overview: Nav Chakravarti is responsible for articulating InQuiraâ€™s product vision and guiding product and solutions strategy. Nav was part of InQuiraâ€™s founding team and brings over 18 years of experience in consulting, implementation and solution architecting to his role. During his long tenure at InQuira, he has played a variety of executive roles in solutions consulting, professional services and product marketing. Prior to InQuira, Nav spent seven years at Cambridge Technology Partners (CTP) where as Director, he drove growth in the Midwest region by leading and architecting large scale custom software and CRM implementations in a variety of industries. Nav holds an MBA from the Anderson School at UCLA, an MS in Electrical Engineering and a BS in Computer Engineering from Michigan State University.
